name: Zombie Rush (itch)
description:
You start as a lonely zombie, but there are bunch of people around, so you can turn them into your friends. Run around, kill people, make more zombies, but beware of military in the area.

- Combination of 3D and 2D retro-styled graphics;

- Simple controls (only four buttons, yay!);

- When you die, you don't loose, you start playing as another nearest zombie;

- Some catz (they don't give a f... about apocalypse around);

Grow your horde, rush and kill all the people!

This game was made within 48 hours for Ludum Dare #33 (Theme: "You are the monster").
